Submodules¶

pyyabc.crystal.derive module¶

class pyyabc.crystal.derive.ConfigurationGenerator(cell, symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

基类：object

pcell: Cell object, The primitive cell to be extended

cons_max_volume(sites, max_volume, min_volume=1, dimension=3, symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

parameters:

pcell: Cell object, The primitive cell to be extended sites: disorderd sites infomation.

yield:

Cell object, a list of non-redundant configurations to max volume supercells.

cons_specific_cell(sites, e_num=None, symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

cons_specific_cell_and_c generate configurations of specific cell and specific concentration.

parameters: sites: list of (lists or tuples), represent element disorder of each sites e_num: tuple, number of atoms in disorderd sites.

e_num 特指无序位点的浓度，也就是原子比，而不是整体构型的元素原子比。有可能其他位点存在相同构型。 !!限制，无序位点的组成必须是相同的，而上面几个函数的无序位点是可以不同的。!!

cons_specific_volume(sites, volume=2, e_num=None, dimension=3, symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

parameters:

sites: 2D list, disorderd sites infomation. volume: int, certain volume with subperiodic. symprec: float, precision for symmetry find.

yield:

a tuple tuple[0]: Cell object, a list of non-redundant configurations of certain volume supercell. tuple[1]: int object, degeneracy of the configuration in all configurations of this volume.

class pyyabc.crystal.derive.PermutationGroup(pcell, mat)[源代码]¶

基类：object

所有的对称操作都是以置换矩阵的形式，作用在一个元素排列上。

get_symmetry_perms(symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶
pyyabc.crystal.derive.cells_nonredundant(pcell, volume=1, dimension=3, symprec=1e-05, comprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

cells_nonredundant return all non duplicated hnf extend cells.

parameters:

pcell: Cell object, The primitive cell to be extended volume: int, Extend to how large supercellself, default=1 symprec: int, symmetry precision When finding duplicated hnfs the precesion, default=1e-5 comprec: float, compare precision When finding the rotations symmetry of primitive cell, defalut=1e-5

yield: A list of Cell objects.

pyyabc.crystal.filter module¶

class pyyabc.crystal.filter.Filter[源代码]¶

基类：object

结构过滤器基类 当返回True时表示该结构满足条件，接受 当返回False时表示结构不满足条件，不接受

is_accepted(cell)[源代码]¶
class pyyabc.crystal.filter.MinDistanceFilter(element, distance)[源代码]¶

基类：pyyabc.crystal.filter.Filter

最小距离过滤器（连通性过滤器） 当返回True时表示该结构中指定元素的距离在晶体中不相连，分散，可接受 当返回False时藐视该结构中指定元素的距离在晶体中过近，相连，不接受

is_accepted(cell)[源代码]¶
class pyyabc.crystal.filter.SpaceGroupFilter(list_spg, symprec=0.001)[源代码]¶

基类：pyyabc.crystal.filter.Filter

对称性过滤器 当返回True时表示该结构的空间群满足 当返回False时表示该结构空间群不满足

is_accepted(cell)[源代码]¶

pyyabc.crystal.mutate module¶

pyyabc.crystal.mutate.cell_to_mcell(cell)[源代码]¶
pyyabc.crystal.mutate.perturb(mcell, distance=0.02)[源代码]¶

对一个结构的所有原子进行扰动，扰动的距离是distance，单位是A distance默认为0.02A perturb sites one by one

pyyabc.crystal.mutate.remove_sites_in_a_circle(mcell, cc, radius, list_ele=None)[源代码]¶

移除以cc为圆心，radius为半径的圆内，所有ele的原子。 cc: 圆心 (x, y, z) 笛卡尔坐标 radius: 半径 单位为A ele: 要删除的元素的list，若为None，则删除所有元素找到的位点

pyyabc.crystal.structure module¶

class pyyabc.crystal.structure.Cell(lattice, positions, atoms)[源代码]¶

基类：object

Cell object represent a crystal structure.

parameters:

lattice: 3x3 1D-list, lattice of cell positions: n tuples(x,y,z) in fraction. 可多态初始化 atoms: list of atoms, can be atomic number (int), can be atomic symbol (string), represent atom in periodic table. (用全称初始化？？谁TM会这么用？)

atoms¶
check(elements=None, limit=0.1, warn=False)[源代码]¶

该方法用于自查对象中的位点是否过近 若过近则抛出一个warning

extend(mat)[源代码]¶

extend transform a cell by mat

parameters: mat: a 3x3 numpy.array

return: A new Cell object.

get_primitive_cell(symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶
get_pure_translations(symprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

get_pure_translations return pure translations.

Info: For the supercell, translations and ratations can be seperated. total length of symmetry operations is len(rot)*len(trans) For the primitive cell, the translation is (0, 0, 0)

pyyabc.crystal.utils.non_dup_hnfs(pcell, volume=1, dimension=3, symprec=1e-05, comprec=1e-05)[源代码]¶

hnf_cells return all non duplicated hnf extend cells.

parameters:

pcell: Cell object, The primitive cell to be extended volume: int, Extend to how large supercellself, default=1 symprec: int, symmetry precision When finding duplicated hnfs the precesion, default=5 comprec: float, compare precision When finding the rotations symmetry of primitive cell, defalut=1e-5

return:

A list of 2D numpy.ndarray.

pyyabc.crystal.utils.snf(mat)[源代码]¶
snf return Smith Normal Form of a 3x3 int matrix
which result_mat = opL * ori_mat * opR

parameter: mat is a 3x3 or nine int list

return: mat: numpy.ndarray, Smith Normal Form matrix opL: left operation opR: right operation
